metadata.title: CVE-2023-42843 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An inconsistent user interface issue was addressed with improved statemanagement. This issue is fixed in iOS 16.7.2 and iPadOS 16.7.2, iOS 17.1and iPadOS 17.1, Safari 17.1, macOS Sonoma 14.1. Visiting a maliciouswebsite may lead to address bar spoofing.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
